Name: Yuli
description:
Yuli is an experienced farmer in Ospina, Nari√±o, with 16 years in the sector. She manages a two-hectare plot where she grows peas, which she treats with environmentally friendly pesticides to protect her crops. Thanks to this meticulous care, Yuli achieves excellent productivity of over 600 kilos of peas daily.

Yuli lives with her husband and two children in a rented house. Her husband plays a crucial role in managing the crops, assisting with daily tasks.

A loan of $1,741,936 COP allows Yuli to buy organic fertilizers, which will enhance soil fertility and boost the production of her pea crops.
